Peggy, the Will O' the Wisp bụ ihe nkiri ihe nkiri America furu efu nke 1917 nke Tod Browning duziri.
Dị ka akọwapụtara na nyocha magazin ihe nkiri, Neil Dacey (Carrigan) hụrụ Peggy Desmond (Taliaferro) n'anya. Terence O'Malley (Sack), nwa nwanne Squire O'Malleys (Ryan), na-achọsi ike imeri Peggy
Terence na nwanne nna ya nwere esemokwu n'ihi na Terence enweghị ike imeri Peggy, e gbukwara squire ahụ
Terence ji égbè Neil gbuo ya, n'ihi ya, a na-ejide Neil maka ogbugbu ahụ
Peggy, iji zọpụta onye ọ na-alụ, na-eyi uwe dị ka will-o'-the-wisp, nke a na-eme ka nkwupụta nke Terence.
